ProjectTitle: Establishing a multifunctional catalytic platform for sustainable and divergent C-C coupling reactions via combined C-H activation and C-S, C-O or C-C heterogroup activation
InitialFeedbackHistory:
02/12/2024
Storage: Please note that box is a cloud storage outside of the university's secure environment; for more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/sc/english/storage/box
Preservation: Please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy asks for 10 years of data preservation: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy; data preservation on a hard drive gives a high risk of data loss; for solutions recommended by ICTS see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Since you mention no restrictions to data sharing, you can consider sharing your data in a trusted data repository such as KU Leuven RDR, this way others can find and reuse your data which gives you more visibility and your data more impact. For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
